info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON... SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA...EASTERN CARROLL...SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lisbon, or 7 miles northwest of Wellsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Liverpool, Wellsville, New Brighton, Beaver, Calcutta, Ohioville, Lisbon, Midland, Chester, Industry, New Cumberland, and Shippingport. This includes Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 33 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
